alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 9:20PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL NOXUBEE AND SOUTHEASTERN LOWNDES COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM CST... At 919 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brooksville, or 9 miles north of Macon, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Crawford around 925 PM CST. Columbus around 935 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern and east central Mississippi.
